header.title: Magic tragic landing page
header.subtitle: the use of means (such as charms or spells) believed to have supernatural power over natural forces

featuresItems.title: Griffindor magic
featuresItems.text: Griffindor is the house of the brave, the loyal, the bold, the courageous.

featuresItems.title: Hufflepuff magic
featuresItems.text: Hufflepuff is the house of the hardworking, the loyal, the kind, the peaceful.

featuresItems.title: Ravenclaw magic
featuresItems.text: Ravenclaw is the house of the wise, the intellectual, the curious, the creative.

featuresItems.title: Slytherin magic
featuresItems.text: Slytherin is the house of the cunning, the strategic, the bold, the ambitious.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.description: We are a team of passionate wizards and witches who are dedicated to helping you spread the magic of our world.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Discover our magical services that will transform your experience

servicesItems.title: Magical Solutions
servicesItems.text: Custom magical solutions tailored to your specific needs and requirements.

servicesItems.title: Potion Brewing
servicesItems.text: Expert potion brewing services with the finest ingredients and techniques.

servicesItems.title: Spell Casting
servicesItems.text: Professional spell casting services for various magical purposes.

servicesItems.title: Divination
servicesItems.text: Accurate divination services to help you see what the future holds.

servicesItems.title: Enchantments
servicesItems.text: Powerful enchantments to protect and enhance your magical items.

servicesItems.title: Magical Training
servicesItems.text: Comprehensive magical training programs for all skill levels.

gallery.title: Gallery
gallery.description: Hogwarts was founded around 990 A.D. by four of the greatest wizards and witches of the age: Godric Gryffindor, Helga Hufflepuff, Rowena Ravenclaw, and Salazar Slytherin. They each represented an aspect of personality that they wanted to bring out in new students.

feedbackItems.feedbackText: For the first time in my life, I have found a place where I can be myself. I am so grateful to have found this place.
This is the best place I have ever been to. I highly recommend it.
I learned so much here. I highly recommend it.
All my family and friends say it's the best place to be.
A lot of experience here. There are a lot of opportunities to get to know new people.
I'm alumna of Hogwarts. It is a place where I found my true self.

team.title: Meet the team
team.subtitle: The team of wizards and witches who are dedicated to helping you spread the magic of our world.

contacts.title: Get in touch with us
contacts.subtitle: We are here to help you with any questions or concerns you may have.
